00024 class CConvolutionKernel2d
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        struct KernelValue
00028        {
00029               int pixelOffset;
00030               double kernelWeight;
00031        };
00032 
00033        typedef std::vector<KernelValue> KernelValues;
00034        typedef typename KernelValues::const_iterator Iterator;
00035 
00036        CConvolutionKernel2d();
00037        CConvolutionKernel2d(const imath::ISampledFunction2d& function);
00038

00063 bool CConvolutionKernel2d::IsValid() const
00064 {
00065        return !m_values.empty();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CConvolutionKernel2d::InitForBitmap(const iimg::IBitmap& bitmap) const
00069 {
00070        I_ASSERT(!m_kernelSize.IsNull());
00071        if (m_kernelSize.IsNull()){
00072               return;
00073        }
00074 
00075        int linesDifference = bitmap.GetLinesDifference();
00076 
00077        int halfWidth = m_kernelSize.GetX() / 2;
00078        int halfHeight = m_kernelSize.GetY() / 2;
00079 
00080        I_ASSERT((m_kernelSize.GetX() * m_kernelSize.GetY()) == int(m_values.size()));
00081 
00082        typename KernelValues::const_iterator elementIter = m_values.begin(); 
00083 
00084        for (int y = -halfHeight; y <= halfHeight; y++){
00085               for (int x = -halfWidth; x <= halfWidth; x++){
00086                      KernelValue& kernelValue = const_cast<KernelValue&>(*elementIter);
00087 
00088                      kernelValue.first = x + y * linesDifference;
00089 
00090                      ++elementIter;
00091               }
00092        }
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 inline typename CConvolutionKernel2d::Iterator CConvolutionKernel2d::Begin() const
00097 {
00098        return m_values.begin();
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 inline typename CConvolutionKernel2d::Iterator CConvolutionKernel2d::End() const
00103 {
00104        return m_values.end();
00105 }

00108 inline double CConvolutionKernel2d::GetWeightsSum() const

00110        return m_sumWeights;
00111 }

00114 inline i2d::CRectangle CConvolutionKernel2d::GetBoundingBox() const
00115 {
00116        return i2d::CRectangle(m_kernelSize);
